rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: National Turkey Federation Vice President of Communications Beth Breeding told FOX Business that producers are focused on farm security every day and that members remain vigilant and practice all biosecurity protocols.
